mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join([f"{start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')} to {end_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}" if start_date != end_date else start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') for (start_date, end_date) in ranges])

mutants.original_line: dates = sorted([datetime.strptime(d, "%Y-%m-%d") for d in date_str.split(",")])
mutants.mutated_line: dates = sorted([datetime.strptime(d, '') for d in date_str.split(',')])
return ', '.join([f"{start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')} to {end_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}" if start_date == end_date else start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') for (start_date, end_date) in ranges])

mutants.original_line: dates = sorted([datetime.strptime(d, "%Y-%m-%d") for d in date_str.split(",")])
mutants.mutated_line: dates = sorted([datetime.strptime(d, '%Y-%m-%d') for d in date_str.split('')])
return ', '.join([f"{start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}{end_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}" if start_date != end_date else start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') for (start_date, end_date) in ranges])
return ', '.join([f"{start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')} to {end_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}" if start_date != end_date else start_date.strftime('') for (start_date, end_date) in ranges])
return ', '.join([f"{start_date.strftime('')} to {end_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}" if start_date != end_date else start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') for (start_date, end_date) in ranges])
return ', '.join([f"{start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')} to {end_date.strftime('')}" if start_date != end_date else start_date.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') for (start_date, end_date) in ranges])
